title: 12/31/20 – DPS – Best Of
itunes:title: 12/31/20 – DPS – Best Of
description:
Doug Gottlieb and Rob Parker fill in for Dan Patrick and debate whether or not the Miami Dolphins are sold on Tua Gagovailoa. They talk about what they need to see this year in the College Football Playoff and discuss a glaring problem with the NBA through the first couple weeks of the season. Plus, they speak with former Pro Bowl linebacker and current Lights Out Podcast host Shawne Merriman! 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
